TopicTitle: Weird popup over Staging area in VAB

Articles.Content:
https://imgur.com/a/BaWCEkq

Reverted after a "professionally" failed launch, and this shows up. I can remove it using F2, but it removes other overlays as well, which is kinda weird. Any1 else have this issue / bug?

Restarting the game doesn't change anything unfortunately. Some sort of UI bug
